format: A data frame containing 5,190 observations on 12 variables.
reference: Journal of Applied Econometrics Data Archive.
title: Australian Health Service Utilization Data
description:
Description
Cross-section data originating from the 1977–1978 Australian Health Survey.

parameters.freerepat:
Factor. Does the individual have free government health insurance due to old age, 
disability or veteran status?
parameters.health: General health questionnaire score using Goldberg's method.
parameters.lchronic: Factor. Is there a chronic condition limiting activity?
parameters.income: Annual income in tens of thousands of dollars.
parameters.illness: Number of illnesses in past 2 weeks.
parameters.reduced: Number of days of reduced activity in past 2 weeks due to illness or injury.
parameters.freepoor: Factor. Does the individual have free government health insurance due to low income?
parameters.nchronic: Factor. Is there a chronic condition not limiting activity?
parameters.private: Factor. Does the individual have private health insurance?
parameters.visits: Number of doctor visits in past 2 weeks.
